DOC.brief_title: 9 Months Extension Study SOMVC001 Study ( GALA ) Vascular Conduit Preservation Solution
DOC.detailed_description: Patients enrol 9-months extension study SOMVC001 ( GALA ) contact phone twice : 6 month 9 month coronary artery bypass graft ( CABG ) surgery . During phone call visit twelve month post CABG surgery , adverse event and/or concomitant medication change collect participant . Twelve month CABG surgery procedure , image perform use 64-slice well MDCT-scan angiography . The study participation end MDCT-scan visit . In detail , record incidence composite safety outcome consist Major Adverse Cardiac Events ( MACE ) ( death , myocardial infarction [ MI ] , repeat revascularization ) , angina , arrhythmia , shortness breath [ SOB ] , decrease lumen change , graft occlusion significant stenosis base Fitzgibbon 's scale B O , follow CABG surgery . Patients study control ; receive two SVG ; one expose GALA expose heparinized dose saline . The effect treatment ( GALA vs. Saline ) evaluate paired graft within-person . Therefore , treatment effect present graft patient . Only adverse clinical event present patient include potential relationship study product .
